title: Netflix adds support for the Exynos 2200, the chipset powering the Galaxy S22 series
content:
We’re not too far away from Samsung’s first 2022 flagship smartphone lineup. From design and full specifications to potential pricing, the steady stream of leaks over the past months have left little to the imagination about the Galaxy S22 series. Now Netflix has also seemingly confirmed a key detail about the lineup. Besides maintaining lists

The post Netflix adds support for the Exynos 2200, the chipset powering the Galaxy S22 series appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Netflix has updated its list of compatible chipsets with the addition of the Exynos 2200, the chipset which is all but confirmed to power the Galaxy S22 lineup.
